nodes.text:
Bhat Jul was a male Kajain'sa'Nikto who served the Jedi Order as a Jedi Commander during the Clone Wars. The Nikto was apprenticed to Jedi Knight A'Sharad Hett at the time.
Unfortunately, during an early deployment to the planet Aargonar, Bhat Jul spent his last moments in Anakin Skywalker's arms as he suffered from explosion-induced injuries. The young Jedi was left to be covered in the sand to the bidding of his Master, Hett, of whom was a Tusken Raider who believed the act would honor the fallen Nikto's life.
Sensitive to the Force, Bhat Jul was chosen as a Padawan learner by A'Sharad Hett.
Bhat Jul appears in the 58th and 59th parts from the Star Wars Republic comic series released on December 17 2003 and December 31 2003 by Dark Horse Comics.
